00024 typedef struct {
00025   int normal;
00026   int npoints;
00027   double range;
00028 } densparameters;

00031 typedef struct {
00032   int izcw;
00033   int npoints;
00034   double range;
00035 } rdensparameters;

00037 
00038 static void ob_densx(densparameters* par,
00039                      const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00040                      const GaussianAux* X, complex double* dens)
00041 {       
00042   int v = par->normal;
00043   int n = par->npoints;
00044   double xmax = par->range;
00045   int i,j;
00046   double x[3];
00047   int vx, vy;
00048   complex double rho;
00049 
00050   if (v==0) {
00051     vx = 1; vy = 2;
00052   } else if (v==1) {
00053     vx = 0; vy = 2;
00054   } else {
00055     vx = 0; vy = 1;
00056   }
00057 
00058   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00059     for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00060 
00061       x[v] = 0.0;
00062       x[vx] = -xmax+2*xmax*i/(n-1);
00063       x[vy] = -xmax+2*xmax*j/(n-1);
00064 
00065       rho = 
00066         cexp(-0.5*(csqr(x[0] - conj(G1->b[0]))+csqr(x[1] - conj(G1->b[1]))+
00067                    csqr(x[2] - conj(G1->b[2])))/conj(G1->a)
00068              -0.5*(csqr(x[0] - G2->b[0])+csqr(x[1] - G2->b[1])+
00069                    csqr(x[2] - G2->b[2]))/G2->a)* X->S;
00070 
00071       dens[i+j*n      ] += rho* X->T;
00072       if (G1->xi == +1)
00073         dens[i+j*n+  n*n] += rho* X->T;
00074       if (G1->xi == -1)
00075         dens[i+j*n+2*n*n] += rho* X->T;
00076     }
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080 static void ob_rdensx(rdensparameters* par,
00081                       const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00082                       const GaussianAux* X, complex double* dens)
00083 {       
00084   int izcw = par->izcw;
00085   int n = par->npoints;
00086   double rmax = par->range;
00087   int i,j;
00088   double r, alpha, beta, x[3];
00089   complex double rho;
00090 
00091   int nzcw = nangles2(izcw);
00092   double weight = 1.0/nzcw;
00093 
00094   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00095     r = rmax* i/(n-1);
00096 
00097     for (j=0; j<nzcw; j++) {
00098       getangles2(izcw, j, &alpha, &beta);
00099 
00100       x[0] = r*cos(alpha)*sin(beta);
00101       x[1] = r*sin(alpha)*sin(beta);
00102       x[2] = r*cos(beta);
00103 
00104       rho =
00105         cexp(-0.5*(csqr(x[0] - conj(G1->b[0]))+csqr(x[1] - conj(G1->b[1]))+
00106                    csqr(x[2] - conj(G1->b[2])))/conj(G1->a)
00107              -0.5*(csqr(x[0] - G2->b[0])+csqr(x[1] - G2->b[1])+
00108                    csqr(x[2] - G2->b[2]))/G2->a)* X->S;
00109 
00110       dens[i   ] += weight* rho* X->T;
00111       if (G1->xi == 1)
00112         dens[i+  n] += weight* rho* X->T;
00113       if (G1->xi == -1)
00114         dens[i+2*n] += weight* rho* X->T;
00115     }
00116   }     
00117 }

00120 static void ob_densp(densparameters* par,
00121                      const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00122                      const GaussianAux* X, complex double* dens)
00123 {       
00124   int v = par->normal;
00125   int n = par->npoints;
00126   double pmax = par->range;
00127   int i,j;
00128   double p[3], p2;
00129   int vx, vy;
00130   complex double rho;
00131 
00132   if (v==0) {
00133     vx = 1; vy = 2;
00134   } else if (v==1) {
00135     vx = 0; vy = 2;
00136   } else {
00137     vx = 0; vy = 1;
00138   }
00139 
00140   for (j=0; j<n; j++)
00141     for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00142 
00143       p[v] = 0.0;
00144       p[vx] = -pmax+2*pmax*i/(n-1);
00145       p[vy] = -pmax+2*pmax*j/(n-1);
00146         
00147       p2 = p[0]*p[0]+p[1]*p[1]+p[2]*p[2];
00148 
00149       rho = 
00150         cpow32(conj(G1->a)*G2->a)*
00151         cexp(-0.5*conj(G1->a)*p2 + 
00152              I*(p[0]*conj(G1->b[0])+p[1]*conj(G1->b[1])+p[2]*conj(G1->b[2]))
00153              -0.5*G2->a*p2 
00154              -I*(p[0]*G2->b[0]+p[1]*G2->b[1]+p[2]*G2->b[2]))* X->S;
00155       
00156       dens[i+j*n      ] += rho* X->T;
00157       if (G1->xi == +1)
00158         dens[i+j*n+  n*n] += rho* X->T;
00159       if (G1->xi == -1)
00160         dens[i+j*n+2*n*n] += rho* X->T;
00161     }
00162 }

00164 
00165 static void ob_rdensp(rdensparameters* par,
00166                       const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00167                       const GaussianAux* X, complex double* dens)
00168 {       
00169   int izcw = par->izcw;
00170   int n = par->npoints;
00171   double pmax = par->range;
00172   int i,j;
00173   double pr, alpha, beta, p[3], p2;
00174   complex double rho;
00175 
00176   int nzcw = nangles2(izcw);
00177   double weight = 1.0/nzcw;
00178 
00179   for (i=0; i<n; i++) {
00180     pr = pmax* i/(n-1);
00181 
00182     for (j=0; j<nzcw; j++) {
00183       getangles2(izcw, j, &alpha, &beta);
00184 
00185       p[0] = pr*cos(alpha)*sin(beta);
00186       p[1] = pr*sin(alpha)*sin(beta);
00187       p[2] = pr*cos(beta);
00188 
00189       p2 = pr*pr;
00190 
00191       rho = 
00192         cpow32(conj(G1->a)*G2->a)*
00193         cexp(-0.5*conj(G1->a)*p2 + 
00194              I*(p[0]*conj(G1->b[0])+p[1]*conj(G1->b[1])+p[2]*conj(G1->b[2]))
00195              -0.5*G2->a*p2 
00196              -I*(p[0]*G2->b[0]+p[1]*G2->b[1]+p[2]*G2->b[2]))* X->S;
00197 
00198       dens[i   ] += weight* rho* X->T;
00199       if (G1->xi == 1)
00200         dens[i+  n] += weight* rho* X->T;
00201       if (G1->xi == -1)
00202         dens[i+2*n] += weight* rho* X->T;
00203     }
00204   }
00205 }

00208 void calcDensitiesCoordinate(const SlaterDet* Q,
00209                              int v, int n, double x, double* dens)
00210 {
00211   SlaterDetAux X;
00212   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00213   calcSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00214 
00215   densparameters P = { normal: v, npoints: n, range: x };
00216   OneBodyOperator op_ob_dens = {dim: 3*n*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_densx};
00217 
00218   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, &X, &op_ob_dens, dens);
00219 
00220   freeSlaterDetAux(&X);
00221 }

00223 
00224 void calcDensitiesCoordinateParity(const SlaterDet* Q, int par,
00225                                    int v, int n, double x, double* dens)
00226 {
00227   double nlr;
00228   complex double ovllr;
00229   complex double denslr[3*n*n];
00230 
00231   SlaterDet Ql, Qr;
00232   initSlaterDet(Q, &Ql);
00233   initSlaterDet(Q, &Qr);
00234 
00235   SlaterDetAux X;
00236   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00237 
00238   densparameters P = { normal: v, npoints: n, range: x };
00239   OneBodyOperator op_ob_dens = {dim: 3*n*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_densx};
00240 
00241   int ipl, ipr, k;
00242 
00243   nlr = 0;
00244   copySlaterDet(Q, &Ql);
00245   for (ipl=0; ipl<=1; ipl++) {
00246 
00247     if (ipl)
00248       invertSlaterDet(&Ql);
00249 
00250     copySlaterDet(Q, &Qr);
00251     for (ipr=0; ipr<=1; ipr++) {
00252 
00253       if (ipr)
00254         invertSlaterDet(&Qr);
00255 
00256       calcSlaterDetAuxod(&Ql, &Qr, &X);
00257       ovllr = X.ovlap;
00258 
00259       calcSlaterDetOBMEod(&Ql, &Qr, &X, &op_ob_dens, denslr);
00260 
00261       nlr += ((par == -1 && (ipl+ipr)%2) ? -1 : 1)* ovllr;
00262 
00263       for (k=0; k<3*n*n; k++)
00264         dens[k] += ((par == -1 && (ipl+ipr)%2) ? -1 : 1)* denslr[k];
00265 
00266     }
00267 
00268   }
00269 
00270   for (k=0; k<3*n*n; k++)
00271     dens[k] = dens[k]/nlr;
00272 
00273   freeSlaterDet(&Ql); freeSlaterDet(&Qr);
00274   freeSlaterDetAux(&X);
00275 }

00278 void calcRadialDensitiesCoordinate(const SlaterDet* Q,
00279                                    int izcw, int n, double r, double* dens)
00280 {
00281   SlaterDetAux X;
00282   initSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00283   calcSlaterDetAux(Q, &X);
00284 
00285   rdensparameters P = { izcw: izcw, npoints: n, range: r };
00286   OneBodyOperator op_ob_rdens = {dim: 3*n, opt: 1, par: &P, me: ob_rdensx};
00287 
00288   calcSlaterDetOBME(Q, &X, &op_ob_rdens, dens);
00289 
00290   freeSlaterDetAux(&X);
00291 }

00332
